title: To Earth, With Love: A Spiritual Fiction on Life, Death, Family and our Daily Dose of Wellness for Human Evolution by Design
description: ONE Soul at a time, ONE Family at a time...Humanity as a Collective can awaken itself through Aware-Design for a Desired Future. A Fantasy Fiction depicting the Synchronicity of Heaven and Earth, through the story of the mystical land of Eldium, its governors and the darkness too. Through the eyes of a little soul, we see the complexities of Earthly life and her navigation between the two lands.We can draw from our familiar Energy-Based Systems, to help access the unseen dimensions of our infinite space for micro, everyday steps for the Ultimate Evolution of Humanity to Realise an Idyllic Future.Come, Read on...
author: Gitanjali Pahwa
